issues.description: The template's PersonService declares a PersonRepository field but does not provide any injection (no constructor or @Autowired on the field). The problem statement and the provided tests expect PersonService methods (save, addParent, addChild, removeParent, removeChild) to call personRepository (e.g., personRepository.save(...)). As-is the template's personRepository will be null at runtime, causing NullPointerExceptions when students run tests or implement the TODO methods. The solution repository uses constructor injection (a PersonService(PersonRepository personRepository) constructor and a final field), which demonstrates the intended wiring. This mismatch between template (no wiring) and solution (constructor injection) is structural and will block students from executing and verifying their implementations.
